t: XIKAR Cigar Bar Humidifier : Amazon.co.uk: Home & Kitchen
Amazon.com: XIKAR EX Windproof Lighter Brushed Silver : Health & Household
s: When Xikar moved their production overseas, their quality left with them. So my current thoughts are this... There are cheaper torches and flame lighters on the market. The aesthetics of this don't outweigh the headache. So either buy a cheap refillable butane lighter or spend a bit more and shop for a better brand...

The lighter is slim when combined with the matching cutter, which attaches to the side of the lighter by magnet. The combination is slim compared to other lighter and cutter pairings. The lighter has a large fuel capacity. Like other Xikar lighters, mine (I have 2) are extremely reliable.
